com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.config
Class HBaseClientConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  com.datasift.dropwizard.hbase.config.HBaseClientConfiguration

public class HBaseClientConfiguration
extends Object

Configuration for an HBaseClient.

Field Summary
protected  Duration connectionTimeout
          The maximum time to wait for a connection to a region server before failing.
protected  Duration flushInterval
          The maximum amount of time requests may be buffered client-side before sending them to the server.
protected  Size incrementBufferSize
          The maximum size of the buffer for increment operations.
protected  boolean instrumented
          Whether the HBaseClient should be instrumented with Metrics.
protected  int maxConcurrentRequests
          The maximum number of concurrent asynchronous requests for the client.
protected  ZooKeeperConfiguration zookeeper
          The ZooKeeper quorum co-ordinating the HBase cluster.

Field Detail

zookeeper

@NotNull
protected ZooKeeperConfiguration zookeeper
The ZooKeeper quorum co-ordinating the HBase cluster.

See Also:
ZooKeeperConfiguration

flushInterval

@NotNull
protected Duration flushInterval
The maximum amount of time requests may be buffered client-side before sending them to the server.

See Also:
HBaseClient.setFlushInterval(short)

incrementBufferSize

@NotNull
protected Size incrementBufferSize
The maximum size of the buffer for increment operations.

Once this buffer is full, a flush is forced irrespective of the flushInterval.

See Also:
HBaseClient.setIncrementBufferSize(int)

maxConcurrentRequests

@Min(value=0L)
protected int maxConcurrentRequests
The maximum number of concurrent asynchronous requests for the client.

Useful for throttling high-throughput applications when HBase is the bottle-neck to prevent the client running out of memory.

With this is zero ("0"), no limit will be placed on the number of concurrent asynchronous requests.

See Also:
BoundedHBaseClient

connectionTimeout

@NotNull
protected Duration connectionTimeout
The maximum time to wait for a connection to a region server before failing.

instrumented

protected boolean instrumented
Whether the HBaseClient should be instrumented with Metrics.
